citation.excerpt: [May 2021] Vision Transformer backbone supported, see configs/Market1501/bagtricks_vit.yml.
[Sep 2020] Added the person attribute recognition based on fastreid. See projects/FastAttr.
Please refer to changelog.md for details and release history.

description.excerpt:
Support many tasks beyond reid, such image retrieval and face recognition. See release notes. 
[Oct 2020] Added the Hyper-Parameter Optimization based on fastreid. See projects/FastTune.

[Sep 2020] Automatic Mixed Precision training is supported with apex. Set cfg.SOLVER.FP16_ENABLED=True to switch it on. 
[Aug 2020] Model Distillation is supported, thanks for guan'an wang's contribution. 
[Aug 2020] ONNX/TensorRT converter is supported.

Includes more features such as circle loss, abundant visualization methods and evaluation metrics, SoTA results on conventional, cross-domain, partial and vehicle re-id, testing on multi-datasets simultaneously, etc. 
Can be used as a library to support different projects on top of it. We'll open source more research projects in this way.

excerpt.body:
# Features & Improvements

## New Features
- Vision Transformer backbone, see config in `configs/Market1501/bagtricks_vit.yml`
- Self-Distillation with EMA update
- Gradient Clip

## Improvements
 - Faster dataloader with pre-fetch thread and cuda stream
-  Impl `freezebackbone` function in step of optimizer
 - Optimize DDP training speed by removing `find_unused_parameters` in DDP
excerpt.name: V1.3.0

excerpt.body:
# Features & Improvements:
 - Built-in [distillation](https://github.com/JDAI-CV/fast-reid/blob/master/fastreid/modeling/meta_arch/distiller.py) and [memory bank](https://github.com/JDAI-CV/fast-reid/blob/master/fastreid/modeling/meta_arch/moco.py) are supported.
 - Add automatically hyper-parameters optimization is `projects/FastTune`.
 - Add some extension tasks in `projects/`, including [face recogntion](https://github.com/JDAI-CV/fast-reid/tree/master/projects/FastFace), [attributed recognition](https://github.com/JDAI-CV/fast-reid/tree/master/projects/FastAttr), [image classification](https://github.com/JDAI-CV/fast-reid/tree/master/projects/FastCls), [overhaul distillation](https://github.com/JDAI-CV/fast-reid/tree/master/projects/FastDistill) and [image retrieval](https://github.com/JDAI-CV/fast-reid/tree/master/projects/FastRetri).
 - Support mixed precision training (using `cfg.SOLVER.FP16_ENABLED`) powered by `apex`.
 - Accelerate re-rank with `faiss-gpu`.
 - Change lr scheduler by epoch, and warmup by iter.
excerpt.name: v1.0.0

excerpt.body:
Some major features:

- Distributed DataParallel(DDP) training and evaluation.

- Model distillation.

- Caffe/ONNX/TensoRT deployment.

- Pretrained model release.
excerpt.name: v0.1.1

excerpt.body:
Some major features:

- High modular design.

- SoTA results on conventional person re-id, cross-domain person re-id, partial person re-id, and vehicle re-id.

- multi-GPU training and multi-dataset testing simultaneously

- standard dataset splits used by the most paper.

- visualization methods including rank list and annotation visualization.

- abundant evaluation metrics including CMC, mAP, mINP, and ROC.
excerpt.name: v0.1

usage.excerpt:
The designed architecture follows this guide [PyTorch-Project-Template](https://github.com/L1aoXingyu/PyTorch-Project-Template), you can check each folder's purpose by yourself.

See [GETTING_STARTED.md](GETTING_STARTED.md).

Learn more at out [documentation](https://fast-reid.readthedocs.io/). And see [projects/](projects) for some projects that are build on top of fastreid.
